name: Seifu & Demon Fox Girl Deluxe(Cheat)
description:
***Story***

Mysterious Demon fox girl is abducting men in a distant small village, Demon hunter Seifu was hired to solve this crisis, Now, gear up your katana and ninja stars, save the people in Sakura Village!

 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 ***Extra Content***

This Deluxe version contains follwing content:

1.Cheat system that can manually turn on/off

2.Beach party map that contain all characters turn into female and in swimming suit

3.Arena that you can choose serial bosses fighting order, and special rules

4.One more summon(Nightmare) than the special version

5.One more very hard boss (for player who think web/demo version is too easy)

6.Contain everything that is already in web(demo) and Special version

Welcome to play free web(demo) version on Newgrounds:

LINK

Or if you want the cheaper Special Version which contains less extra content:

LINK

Other exclusive content(prototype version, music etc.) visit my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PoliuxDimension

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

***YouTube Trailer & Tutorial Videos***

Official Game Trailer on YouTube:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Join my discord server if you wan ask me something instantly(If I'm online) https://discord.gg/DTWfueV 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

***Basic Control ***

Left & Right arrow keys: move/run Up arrow key: Enter doors or portals / investigate / talk Down arrow key: pick up item A: Dodge/Dash (transient invincibility) S: Throw projectile (You can change projectile in Q menu) D: Slash W: Take pill and heal (After you get red pills) Q: Menu (You can change input key/volume/full screen...)

***Special Trick***

Dash: Press dodge while running

Counter Attack: Press dodge right before an enemy hits you

Final Thrust: press dodge again after counter attack (If your final thrust energy bar is full)

Summon: Select corresponding projectile and hold throw key, after charge up, release key to summon NPC that deal strong attack

Cheat: Open Q menu and click the tags to the cheat page, click each cheat icon to turn it on/off

Slash and Throw can be execute continuously and interchangeably, but they consume stamina, so does dodge All attacks generate final thrust energy

***Save System***

You need to manually save at save board in this game. You can strategically not save and reload old file. Time and other data can be reset to old save's data. Remember to allow flash player setting access save.
